about_the_game:
Immortal Legacy: The Jade Cipher Original Sound Track is created by Eddy Liu.
The concept of music for immortal legacy is to provide an immersive atmosphere along with the visual content for players. To achieve that, sound effects like the metal hit, eerie wind are widely introduced as part of the instrument during music composition. For storytell cutscenes, orchestration combines with synthesizers are often used to increase the sense of epic and horror. Also, there are a lot of ambient music occasionally triggered at the first half part of the game as the character are still up the surface and wandering in a natural world. Once the player gets into the underground grave, the music is slowly transformed with some very low drone sound and eerie pad, to reflect an unpleasant, sealed and dangerous environment.
